column2: TabName: unique single word + no numbers + used as variable name and as key in associative array

column3: GroupName: unique single word + used as key in associative array

column4: LAN Configuration (DirectAccess [Diagnostics on LAN Troubleshoot] + SSDP [WiFi Direct])
Microsoft Store (Sync with MS Account [UWP apps] + Sync with MS Account [OS with Online Account])
Microsoft Store (UWP apps works in background)
Microsoft Store (Create new MS account + MS Apps with MS Account authorization)
Microsoft Store (Settings ==> System ==> Storage ==> SETTINGS APP CRASH!!!)
Local Account with Password (Password + Windows Hello [Face + Fingerprint + PIN])
Bluetooth Devices (Usage with multiple User Accounts) [for Single User Account not needed]
Bluetooth Devices (Phone call through Bluetooth) [for PC and Notebook not needed]
Printer (Virtual Printer + Network Printer + Local Printer)
Scanner (Virtual Scanner + Network Scanner + Local Scanner) [use VueScan to access scanner without this service]
Fax (Virtual Fax + Network Fax + Local Fax) [service PhoneSvc only for faxes and not for phones]
Windows Update (Online Updates + MS Store apps updates) [CAN'T BE DISABLED HERE: use Sordum Windows Update Blocker]
Windows Update (Download from multiple sources) [disable and download from single source]
Tablet Mode [for PC and Notebook not needed]
Tablet Mode (Sensor Service) [Settings ==> System ==> Power && Battery ==> SETTINGS APP CRASH!!!]
Monitor (Connected Remotely) [for local multiple monitors not needed]
Monitor (WiFi Direct) [ACTION CENTER [Win+A] ==> Bluetooth (Manage Bluetooth Devices) + Cast [Win+K] + Project (Multi-Monitor Configuration) [Win+P] ==> STOP WORKING!!!]
Phone Link (Virtual Desktops + Phone Link + Night Light) [COUPLED WITH SPY: MANUALLY DELETE SERVICES]
Phone Link (Remote install apps from MS Store to devices with MS Account)
Themes [customize and apply desired theme then disable service]
Mobile (Hotspot) [Settings ==> Bluetooth & Devices ==> Mobile Hotspot ==> NOT WORK!!!]
Mobile (Traffic Counter) [Settings ==> Network & Internet ==> Advanced Network Settings ==> Data Usage ==> MISSING!!!]

LAN (Network LogOn) [for simple Home Network not needed or network is configured already]

Windows Media (Sync library on other devices with Windows Media Player)

Remote Control ("Server" connection to configure remote "RDP Server") [you still can connect to remote RDP Server]
Localization (Download New Languages for OS) [you still can switch between downloaded languages] [Settings ==> Time && Language ==> Language && Region ==> Add a Language ==> NOT WORK!!!]
Security Center [notify about disabled security features: Defender + Firewall + SmartScreen + etc]
Secure JIT Compiler for Edge [intercepts scripts ==> securely compile ==> Defender check on virus ==> allows Edge compile them on its own]
Background Diagnostics [use SYSTEM rights to disable]
